description: Java entity class representing a Note object in a note management system, mapped to a database table with JPA annotations.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class for notes, including fields for id, title, content, timestamps, and owner, with lifecycle callbacks for timestamp management.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Callback method to set creation and update timestamps before persisting the entity.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Callback method to update the timestamp before updating the entity.
